title: Michelle Monaghan, cutest Hollywood Actress
review: Is it just me or is Michelle Monaghan the cutest freaking thing ever. I watch all her movies and I don't think there is a more adorable person in the world. Her face, her expressions, the way she talks, there is no one cuter. She is the epitome of a dream girl. Not to mention, she is really like that in real life. She came from Winthrop Iowa, a city of just 900 people to become a superstar. She kind of flies under the radar but I do not understand how. She is finally starting to get more movies and recognition but I just cant believe how freakin adorable she is every time I see her in a movie or interview, most naturally beautiful and adorable woman alive.
